body_html: Yeah,i do another experiment that is running the python script with CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES is 0 and 1,at same time also running the nvidia-smi commend.There are different results between nvidia-smi and tensorflow's device_lib.I set CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES is 1,and nvidia-smi also show the GPU1 is working,but tensorflow show the GPU0 is working,maybe there is a bug.
body_text: Yeah,i do another experiment that is running the python script with CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES is 0 and 1,at same time also running the nvidia-smi commend.There are different results between nvidia-smi and tensorflow's device_lib.I set CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES  is 1,and nvidia-smi also show the GPU1 is working,but tensorflow show the GPU0 is working,maybe there is a bug.
body:
Yeah,i do another experiment that is running the python script with CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES is 0 and 1,at same time also running the nvidia-smi commend.There are different results between nvidia-smi and tensorflow's device_lib.I set CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES  is 1,and nvidia-smi also show the GPU1 is working,but tensorflow show the GPU0 is working,maybe there is a bug.
![2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28638716/44074290-97d6ac4a-9fca-11e8-95bf-630590c908fe.PNG)
![1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28638716/44074295-99d8999a-9fca-11e8-95f2-fc2d52b8798f.PNG)
